ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 1263
ygData.msgSnippet: Well Poke, I think you are in the wrong group but there is an EQOA group called Everquest_Online_Adventures. as for an update on EQOA, I couldn t tell you,
ygData.messageBody:
Well Poke, I think you are in the wrong group but there is an EQOA group called Everquest_Online_Adventures. as for an update on EQOA, I couldn't tell you, haven't played it since beta. Last I heard there was a new expansion or version (You really can't add an expansion to a PS2 game I think.) called EQOA Realms but I can't remember.

Sorry I'm not much more help. :-(
Durgaa
Mystic Crusaders
Bristlebane Server - EQ1
